Author: yuvadeep
Title: [ANN] NEW ICO: Humbyl-- Decentralized Fantasy Sports 解攫
Body: Humbly platform is competition performed by our smart contact and they named it as Fantasy. Each contest is designed based on specific sports with events happening in the world through an application named as a binary interface (ABI). Users who are the holders of HBL coin have the right to participate in the contest. Thus, the user can join any contest by sending the transaction of the match contract to the contract address as long as the paying rules are following.  Therefore, each contest needs to keep in mind that coins are required for entry, a maximum number of parties to be joined, verifies whether the contest creators follow Terms of Service(ToS) for example need to avoid the quarrel within a given athletic event. Since one challenge is finished, the total result will be posted in the given contract of blockchain with the help of contract ABI and end results will be calculated based on the playing policies.  As a result, once the prize is calculated, total coins earned by them are sent to the wallet address. As the coins are sent to the wallet it will inform automatically that you are the winners of that game.  For some reason, unexpectedly if the match cancels then the original coins will be refunded to the players.

Author: brother3
Title: [ANN] NEW ICO: Humbyl-- Decentralized Fantasy Sports 解攫
Body: Humbyl Fantasy Sports Platform Humbyl Platform is a competitive, user-friendly mobile and web interface used for making sportsrelated predictions while wagering Credits purchased or earned on the site (future directions may include non-sports related events, such as pop-culture competitions, political elections, etc.). This allows the Platform to provide HBL holders the opportunity to participate in contests where users who correctly predict the outcome of a game (or an attribute of said game) earn the entirety of the pot (after fees). Transfer from HBL to Credits does not involve any fees and is hassle-free. https://medium.com/@humbylcoin/humbyl-fantasy-sports-platform-cf0538691996

Author: humbylcoin
Title: [ANN] NEW ICO: Humbyl-- Decentralized Fantasy Sports 解攫
Body: http://i.imgur.com/fSTcKPI.png  --- Humbyl Fantasy Sports ---  Humbyl ICO is on BitcoinTalk!  Website | White Paper | Bounty Telegram | Instagram | Twitter | FaceBook | GitHub   Announcing Humbyl ICO, open until the end of August!  No bullshit, no scams, just straight ICO funding of a new decentralized fantasy sports program. While we're open to bounties (contact us as needed) but we're serious about our coin and would never diminish our value without seeing results!   Humbyl is not just your usual decentralized fantasy sports platform--- sure, we offer a transparent, global ETH20-based decentralized fantasy sports platform (on mobile and web), but Humbyl is more than that. Humbyl engages and empowers fans by connecting them to their favorite celebrities and aims to abolish the problems plaguing status-quo sports betting websites.  We simplify decentralized gaming so everyday consumers still have a shot at winning the big prizes, and our business strategy aims big picture--- past ICO, past beta, past launch, to see long-term how we'll achieve our goals of engaging the average user, incorporating celebrities into events, and overall just thinking outside the box.  Join our ICO or contact us through social media, and help us shatter what everyone expects from a decentralized gaming platform!  ICO ENDS AUGUST 31ST   From our white paper https://i.imgur.com/Lytcdg5.png https://i.imgur.com/Dduaowl.png https://i.imgur.com/M2qXweq.png https://i.imgur.com/VbuXIq0.png https://i.imgur.com/Ta7qZWT.png https://i.imgur.com/6q0SbOA.png https://i.imgur.com/zcSfxMC.png

Author: humbylcoin
Title: [ANN] NEW ICO: Humbyl-- Decentralized Fantasy Sports 解攫
Body: There will be a bounty program soon and it's going to be pretty big--- fairly large allocations and almost every social media platform possible. Look for it in the next few days. The project is headed up by more traditional marketers so they only recently put me in charge of recruiting people from BitcoinTalk, since I think the whole process is new to them.   Quote from: thaliaand on June 30, 2018, 02:22:51 PM Looks like this is a lottery platform is not it? Because I see a system of choosing certain sports figures and making bets. So, the result is coming from a real match if I'm not mistaken. Interesting concept in my opinion. And it looks like there will be a bounty campaign, will wait for it. I think decentralized fantasy sports is becoming a little too common, so while our beta platform will likely be minimal (lottery platform, pick winners, etc), the long-term goal is to hold events and make the experience more fun. Plus, there's controversy involving traditional fantasy sports and DFS in which 1% of players earn 96% of the earnings... ideally we avoid that pitfall.   In any case, thank you for your interest.     We genuinely want to involve the community in our efforts and hope our bounty program helps achieve that. ICO aside, having that community will be wonderful for our growth and lead to a better end-product.  - Dr. Nic of Humbyl

Author: humbylcoin
Title: [ANN] NEW ICO: Humbyl-- Decentralized Fantasy Sports 解攫
Body: Thanks for the quote, we were shortsighted when we initially posted and clearly makes us look bad. Also, we raised something like $400,000, although I personally don't handle it so it's just an estimate. We've stalled due to our lackluster marketing efforts that we're trying to remedy, so we're making a much stronger push in August when our beta is released. On the upside, I feel our bonus was a little too generous initially, so it kind of works in our favor.  Quote from: dual77 on July 11, 2018, 11:38:39 AM An active participant in the data Bounty of the company and I can say that I was still satisfied. Bounty-link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4591561.0 If you have any questions, you can always help with the official Telegram Bounty Join now: https://t.me/HumbylCoinBounty Web-site: humbyl.io   And thanks for the support. Our social media marketing team has been undermanned so we couldn't be too active on BitcoinTalk answering questions (the team we hired wasn't professional, waste of funds and time). We're still at a disadvantage because of starting so late in reaching out to BitcoinTalk and because our offline sales team is struggling with old-fashioned marketing attempts. In fact, with only about six weeks remaining, we're finally putting money towards external PR firms and advertisements (with our limited budget, no less). Hell, the product itself is actually almost complete since we sunk our pre-sale funds into development instead of marketing, but more funding will make a stronger, more global product in the end.   Just an update, though (especially to you guys who assume we're a scam)-- we do have a demo video and our partnerships with athletes are genuine. In fact, the irony is that because we invested in our development and our partnerships, we shortchanged our marketing. We've also begun talks with exchanges, although how high we can reach will depend on our ICOs success. If we don't reach softcap, the exchanges we can afford are fairly limited.  And lastly, using a website doesn't make us a scam, dingus. Check the white paper and reach out, we're NOT anonymous, we DO have all details worked out, and we ARE available for chat on our telegram.  - Dr. Nic

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN] NEW ICO: Humbyl-- Decentralized Fantasy Sports 解攫
Body: Humbyl Overview  Humbyl token is the worlds largest cryptocurrency created to engage global players with sports celebrity challenges on our decentralized ERC 20 fantasy sports platform. Our mission is to revolutionize and globalize the online sports gaming industry to ensure a secure, fun and anonymous gaming experience for the global payers. Were committed to bringing this innovation all over the world by unifying the currency as a cryptocurrency we issueHumbyl token. our tokens value will skyrocket once our product dominates the global market to generate a massive amount of demand.  In a nutshell, we create applications in which youll be able to play with the biggest stars around the world and compete for the title of the best. If you are a sports fan, the application will be a great place for another gainful element! Do not forget that in each game you will be able to insert some of your tokens and after winning, win the winnings! https://medium.com/@humbylcoin/what-is-humbyl-34acfa35740a
